meta.description: Optimize the number of orange and apple juice boxes to maximize vitamin D intake while meeting vitamin C requirements and preferences.

sets.name: JUICES
sets.description: Types of juice available for consumption.

params.name: vitamin_content
params.description: Vitamin content per box of each juice type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of boxes of each juice type to drink.

objective.name: max_total_vitamin_D
objective.description: Maximize total vitamin D intake from the juice boxes.

constraints.name: apple_preference
constraints.description: The scientist must drink at least 3 times as many apple juice boxes as orange juice boxes.

constraints.name: min_orange_juice
constraints.description: The scientist must drink at least 3 orange juice boxes.

constraints.name: max_vitamin_C
constraints.description: The total vitamin C intake must not exceed 300 units.
